definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[וַתִּצַּת]] Is 9:17; [[יִצַָּתּוּ]] Is 33:12, Je 51:58 (Kö:i. 431); 3 fpl. [[תִּצַּתְנׇה]] Je 49:2; —kindle, intr., fig. of wickedness, Is 9:17; sq. [[בָּאֵשׁ]] be kindled with fire ( = set on fire), of thorns (in sim.) Is 33:12, Je 49:2 (of dependent towns and villages of Rabbah, under fig. of daughters), Je 51:58 (of gates of Babylon).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִצְּתָה]] 2Ki 22:13, Je 9:11 + Je 2:15 Kt (Qr [[נִצְּתוּ]]); [[וְנִצְּתָה]] consec. 2Ki 22:17 Je 46:19; [[נִצְּתוּ]] Ne 1:3 + 2 t. + Je 2:15 Qr (cf. supr.);—be kindled, fig. of wrath of ´[[י]], 2Ki 22:13, 2Ki 22:17; be burned, of gates of Jerusalem, sq. [[בָּאֵשׁ]], Ne 1:3, Ne 2:17; = desolated Je 2:15 (of cities of Israel), cf. Je 46:19, Je 9:9 (of mountains and pastures); of land Je 9:11 (‖[[אָֽבְדָה]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִצִּית]] Je 11:16; 1 S. [[וְהִצַּתִּי]] consec. Je 17:27 + 5 t.; [[והוחירתיה]] 2Sa 14:30 Kt; (< Qr [[וְהַצִּיתוּהָ]] Imv., Ges:§ 71 Kö:i. 431); [[הִצִּיתוּ]] v:2Sa 14:31, Je 51:30; [[וְהִצִּיתוּ]] consec. Je 32:29; Impf. [[וַיַּצֶּת־]] La 4:11; [[אֲחִיתֶנׇּה]] Is 27:4 (rd. [[אַצִּיתֶנׇּה]] Kö:l. c. Ges:l. c.); [[וַיַׇּצִּיתוּ]] Jos 8:19 + 2 t.; [[תַּצִּיתוּ]] v:Jos 8:8; Imv. 2Sa 14:30 Qr, cf. supr.; Pt. [[מַצִּית]] Ez Eze 21:3; —kindle, set on fire, sq. acc., [[עִיר]] + [[בָּאֵשׁ]] Jos 8:8, Jos 8:19 (JE), Je 32:29 ( + [[שׂרף]]); field of corn, + [[בָּאֵשׂ]] 2Sa 14:30, 2Sa 14:30, 2Sa 14:31; dwellings (no [[באשׁ]]) Je 51:30, cf. also Ju Jdg 9:49; also sq. acc. [[אֵשׁ]] + prep. [[לְ]], Je 11:16 (of Jerusalem under fig. of olive-tree); elsewh. + [[בְּ]], Am 1:14, ´[[והחתי אשׁ ב]] (hence Je 17:27, Je 21:14, Je 43:12, Je 49:27, Je 50:32) La 4:11, Ez Eze 21:3.
